channel.title: My server was Down when . .

item.title: My server was Down when . .
item.dc:creator: @Zaikill Zaikill
item.description:
@Zaikill wrote:

Why my server was shutdown when i kill a monster ???

that begin when i added 5 monsterâ€¦
1 Ice Queen
2 Ice wolf
2 Ice warrior

item3.java code of my new NPC :

public static int Ice_Queen[] = {526,526,526,526,526,526,78,78,1580,1580};
	public static int randomIce_Queen()
	{
		return Ice_Queen[(int)(Math.random()*Ice_Queen.length)];
	}
public static int Ice_wolf[] = {2859,958,958,958,958,958,2859,2859,2859,2859,78,78,78,78,78,78};
	public static int randomIce_wolf()
	{
		return Ice_wolf[(int)(Math.random()*Ice_wolf.length)];
	}
public static int Ice_warrior[] = {7875,7875,7875,7875,7552,7552,1285,1285,1285,1315,1315,1315};
	public static int randomIce_warrior()
	{
		return Ice_warrior[(int)(Math.random()*Ice_warrior.length)];
	}

AND IN MY NPChandler.JAVA

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 795) {

ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomIce_Queen(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1558) {

ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomLesser(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 125) {

ItemHandler.addItem(Item3.randomLesser(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}

AND MY AUTOSPAWN.CFG

//ice monster
spawn = 795	2790	10222	0	0	0	0	0	1	Ice_Queen	
spawn = 125	2788	10223	0	0	0	0	0	1	Ice_Warrior
spawn = 125	2792	10223	0	0	0	0	0	1	Ice_Warrior
spawn = 1558	2791	10220	0	0	0	0	0	1	Ice-Wolf
spawn = 1558	2788	10220	0	0	0	0	0	1	Ice_Wolf

AND my DOS say run attemp failed
wtf ???
help me plz
